content: one full 12 5 hexagon motif will use 20 - 25 yards 38 hexagons whipstitched together into 3 row of 8 2 row of 7 2 half hexagons sewn into top + 2 at the bottom gaps between row border of 2dc separated by picot chains aliases * marguerite #6132 * water lily * pride of the boudoir * sunflower popcorn bedspread * a classic coverlet
